name: Shutter
0:
”Alexa, take a picture with Shutter Remote”
”Alexa, tell Shutter Remote to take a picture”
”Alexa, tell Shutter Remote to snap a selfie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shutter remote
des:
Note: the Shutter app, which is currently in beta testing, is required to use this skill. Visit www.shutterapp.info for more information and to request access to the beta.

If you’ve ever taken a family photo at home, you have probably used a camera timer, fiddly remote, or a selfie stick.

Now you can use your voice.

Introducing Shutter Remote, an Alexa skill that can take pictures with your phone.

It’s simple to use. Just launch the Shutter app, set the shot, then tell Alexa to take a picture with Shutter Remote.

Photos are saved to your phone and not a cloud server.

To learn more, visit shutterapp.info
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
